roleName.ui:title: Role
roleName.ui:help: The name of the Role to create

isClusterRole.ui:help: Check this if the Role and RoleBinding should be created at the Cluster level

serviceAccountName.ui:title: Service Account
serviceAccountName.ui:help: The name of the ServiceAccount to create

namespace.ui:title: Namespace
namespace.ui:help: The target namespace for the Role, RoleBinding and ServiceAccount

apiGroup.ui:title: API Group
apiGroup.ui:help: Which API group the Role applies to, for example 'argoproj.io'

resources.ui:title: Resources
resources.ui:help: Which types of resources the Role applies to, '*' applies to all resources.

verbs.ui:title: Verbs
verbs.ui:help: A list of Verbs that apply to ALL the ResourceKinds and AttributeRestrictions for the Role.
